channel.title: log on vCO Team
channel.description: Recent content in log on vCO Team

item.title: Log plug-ins HTTP communications
item.description: A lot of the Orchestrator plug-ins use the Apache HTTP client to communicate with the target hosts. You may want to log the HTTP communications for many purposes: Understanding how vCO does the API calls Troubleshoot a problem with a target host Re-engineering an existing call with capturing it, changing it as you like and use it via the REST or SOAP plug-in Brag you have found an “Onyx” like functionality for most Orchestrated products This article will guide you on how to log these calls to a file.
